title: Ep136: Ian Hamilton - The Middle Years
itunes:title: Ep136: Ian Hamilton - The Middle Years
description:
The latest episode in Pete and Gary's series about Sir Ian Hamilton explores his involvement in military reform and numerous campaigns, culminating in the Second Boer War. Surely this man is destined for great things in the Great War!


Presenters: Peter Hart and Gary Bain

Publisher: Mat McLachlan

Producer: Jess Stebnicki


Become a member to listen ad-free and receive special bonus content for only £2 per month: https://plus.acast.com/s/pete-and-garys-military-history


Support the show with a one-off contribution: www.buymeacoffee.com/pgmh


For more great history content, visit www.LivingHistoryTV.com, or subscribe to our YouTube channel at www.youtube.com/c/LivingHistoryTV


To walk in the footsteps of the soldiers of the First and Second World Wars, join one of our battlefield tours! Full details at www.battlefields.com.au

Become a member at https://plus.acast.com/s/pete-and-garys-military-history.
